desc: Forget filling up messy, drippy ice cube trays! Freezable long narrow ice sticks fit inside water bottles, soda cans, beverage containers, lunch bags and more. No more watered down beverages, bloated frozen bottles or cracking ice to fit into your water bottle. Freezable ice tubes are quick, easy - just grab and go!

layout.text:
Fill up tap water, freeze and
Place in your favorite beverage
Bottle and cans.
